Privacy policy

Your wallet is encrypted on your device with your personal password.

Your password acts as your decryption key to both lock and unlock your wallet â€” your wallet cannot be accessed without it.

App permissions

  • INTERNET : Connect to node
  • READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Save to wallet file
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Read from wallet file
  • WAKE_LOCK : Keep your phone active while syncing
  • CAMERA : Scan QR code
